languages.text: "О, Катарина..." {n}Абеляр слабо смеется и тут же закашливается. Лицо офицера изрезано глубокими морщинами, а глаза подернуты мутной пленкой катаракты.{/n} "Драйвстемы никак не уймутся... Снова заседание совета... Претензия для логициумов... Душа моя, они никогда не успокоятся... Пока не избавятся от нас и наших детей..."

"Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."
languages.original_text: "О, Катарина..." {n}Абеляр слабо смеется и тут же закашливается. Лицо офицера изрезано глубокими морщинами, а глаза подернуты мутной пленкой катаракты.{/n} "Драйвстемы никак не уймутся... Снова заседание совета... Претензия для логициумов... Душа моя, они никогда не успокоятся... Пока не избавятся от нас и наших детей..."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs weakly and immediately starts coughing. Deep lines run across his face, and a blurry film of cataract clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、クアサリナ…」{n}アベラルドはかすかに笑ったかと思うと、咳き込む。顔には深いシワが走り、白内障のぼやけた膜が目を曇らせている。 {/n}「ドライブステンたちは再び…別の評議会を開く…ロジティウムたちへの新たな訴えを…彼らは決して満足しないでしょう…我々と我々の子供たちを滅ぼすまでは…」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、クアサリナ…」{n}アベラルドはかすかに笑ったかと思うと、咳き込む。顔には深いシワが走り、白内障のぼやけた膜が目を曇らせている。 {/n}「ドライブステンたちは再び…別の評議会を開く…ロジティウムたちへの新たな訴えを…彼らは決して満足しないでしょう…我々と我々の子供たちを滅ぼすまでは…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “噢，奎莎莉娜……”{n}阿贝拉德微微一笑，立刻咳嗽起来。他的脸上布满了深深的皱纹，眼睛上附上了一层模糊的白内障。{/n}“德莱夫斯塔家族的人又来了……他们又要开会了……又要呼吁各种各样的提案……他们真是永远不知满足，亲爱的……恐怕他们只想让咱们和咱们的孩子们彻底消失……”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: “噢，奎莎莉娜……”{n}阿贝拉德微微一笑，立刻咳嗽起来。他的脸上布满了深深的皱纹，眼睛上附上了一层模糊的白内障。{/n}“德莱夫斯塔家族的人又来了……他们又要开会了……又要呼吁各种各样的提案……他们真是永远不知满足，亲爱的……恐怕他们只想让咱们和咱们的孩子们彻底消失……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Oh, Quatharina...». {n}Abelard ríe débilmente y comienza a toser inmediatamente. Líneas profundas recorren su rostro y una borrosa película de cataratas nubla sus ojos.{/n} «Los Drivestem están de vuelta a las andadas... Otra sesión del consejo... Otro llamamiento...Nunca estarán satisfechos, amor... No hasta que nos hagan desaparecer a nosotros y a nuestros hijos...».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: «Oh, Quatharina...». {n}Abelard ríe débilmente y comienza a toser inmediatamente. Líneas profundas recorren su rostro y una borrosa película de cataratas nubla sus ojos.{/n} «Los Drivestem están de vuelta a las andadas... Otra sesión del consejo... Otro llamamiento...Nunca estarán satisfechos, amor... No hasta que nos hagan desaparecer a nosotros y a nuestros hijos...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ach, Quatharina ..." {n}Abelard lacht leicht und bekommt augenblicklich einen Hustenanfall. Tiefe Furchen ziehen sich durch sein Gesicht, und seine Augen sind trüb vom grauen Star.{/n} "Die Drivestems können es einfach nicht lassen ... Wieder eine Ratssitzung ... Wieder ein Antrag an die Logitiums ... Sie werden nie zufrieden sein, mein Herz ... bis sie uns und unsere Kinder verschwinden lassen ..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: "Ach, Quatharina ..." {n}Abelard lacht leicht und bekommt augenblicklich einen Hustenanfall. Tiefe Furchen ziehen sich durch sein Gesicht, und seine Augen sind trüb vom grauen Star.{/n} "Die Drivestems können es einfach nicht lassen ... Wieder eine Ratssitzung ... Wieder ein Antrag an die Logitiums ... Sie werden nie zufrieden sein, mein Herz ... bis sie uns und unsere Kinder verschwinden lassen ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Oh, Quatharina... » {n}Abélard laisse échapper un petit rire qui se transforme en quinte de toux. Son visage est creusé par les rides, et ses yeux voilés par une légère cataracte.{/n} « Les Drivestem ont recommencé... Encore une session du conseil... Encore un appel aux logitiums... Ils ne seront jamais contents, mon amour... pas tant que nous n'aurons pas disparu avec nos enfants... »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Quatharina... » {n}Abélard laisse échapper un petit rire qui se transforme en quinte de toux. Son visage est creusé par les rides, et ses yeux voilés par une légère cataracte.{/n} « Les Drivestem ont recommencé... Encore une session du conseil... Encore un appel aux logitiums... Ils ne seront jamais contents, mon amour... pas tant que nous n'aurons pas disparu avec nos enfants... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Canım Quatharina..." {n}Abelard, hafifçe güldükten sonra hemen öksürük nöbetine tutuluyor. Suratında derin çizgiler beliriyor, gözüne perde iniyor.{/n} "Drivestem ailesi, yine yapacağını yaptı... Yine konsey oturumları... Yine logityumlara başvurular... İkimizi ve çocuklarımızı ortadan kaldırana dek... Asla tatmin olmayacaklar aşkım..."
languages.original_text: "Oh, Quatharina..." {n}Abelard laughs faintly and immediately launches into a bout of coughing. Deep lines run across his face and a blurry film of cataracts clouds his eyes.{/n} "The Drivestems are at it again... Another council session... Another appeal to the logitiums... They will never be satisfied, love... until they make us and our children disappear..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah Quatharina..." {n}Abelard, hafifçe güldükten sonra hemen öksürük nöbetine tutuluyor. Suratında derin çizgiler çıkıyor, gözüne perde iniyor.{/n} "Drivestem ailesi yine yapacağını yaptı... Yine konsey oturumları... Yine logityumlara başvurular... Asla tatmin olmayacaklar aşkım... İkimizi ve çocuklarımızı ortadan kaldırana kadar..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
